com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Inventor.description: Represents a base for both software and hardware nodes

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:DesiredS.description: Represents a desired state to be applied on a device

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:UpdateMa.description: Provides orchestration of OTA Updates towards a target device in a smart way

statusProperties.name: domain
statusProperties.description: The domain of the Update Manager

statusProperties.name: activityId
statusProperties.description: The activity id of the last operation

statusProperties.name: timestamp
statusProperties.description: The timestamp of the last operation

statusProperties.name: inventory
statusProperties.description: The inventory graph representing software and hardware state of the device after the last operation

properties.name: activityId
properties.description: The activity id of the ongoing update

properties.name: desiredStateFeedback
properties.description: The status feedback of the ongoing update

operations.name: apply
operations.description: Applies a desired state to the device

operations.name: refresh
operations.description: Reads the current state from the device and updates the status of the Update Manager

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Action:1.description: Represents an action that is performed during an update procedure

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:StatusTy.description: Represents the possible values for the desired state feedback status

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:DesiredS.description: Represents a status feedback of the ongoing update procedure

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Software.description: Represents the type of a software node

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Associat.description: Represents a link between inventory(software/hardware) nodes

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Inventor.description: Represents graph that provides a view on the hardware and software landscape within a device

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Baseline.description: Represents domain or cross-domain dependencies between components

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:ActionSt.description: Represents the possible status values for an update action

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Domain:1.description: Represents a desired state for a single domain

com.bosch.iot.suite.edge.update:Componen.description: Represents a desired state component with additional key-value configuration pairs
